rules_text:
Whenever you expend 5, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token. [i](You expend 5 as you spend your fifth total mana to cast spells during a turn.)[/i]
Whenever you expend 8, you may have the base power and toughness of other creatures you control become equal to Slymel, Primal Invoker’s power and toughness until end of turn.
